name: Rise for Happyness
description:
The Kardi are strange creatures that resides inside each one of us. They are the responsables of overcoming the grief that comes with a broken heart, but they always need our help in order to succeed! Can you help your Kardi reach the end of the level, and repair your own heart? Use the WASD to move your Kardi across the level. Sometimes, you will to use boxes in order to reach the taller platforms. Remember, sometimes, is perfectly OK to lean in others for help, in order to overcome our obstacles!

A videogame designed for the Global Game Jam 2020 Edition. You can check the game page here: https://globalgamejam.org/2020/games/rise-happyness-9
